title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 240.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 240.1 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) All city school
districts shall continue to be designated as "City School District of the City
of...". (b) All other school
districts shall adopt a simplified legal district name, on or before July 1, 1973, in accordance with the procedures set forth in this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
240.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
